t: KnitPro (Knitter's Pride) – Wool and Company
s: Located in Jaipur, India, KnitPro is a premier manufacturer of high-quality knitting needles, crochet hooks, notions & many other fiber art accessories. Family-owned, the brand has a wonderful commitment to their employees & the environment.
